name: Sungka Guru
description:
*** Play with the computer

*** Initially the player select one hole in the 7 holes below "players camp holes". Then distribute the stones counter clockwise by putting one stone including the player home base.

*** If the player stops at empty hole at player's hole camp, Execute "HANTOK/ capture all the stones of the opponents hole above" and put it in the player's base. The turn is given to the opponent.

*** If the player stops at the Home Base, then additional bonus move granted.

****If the player stops at opponents empty hole, then the turn will be on the opponent.

*** The more stones gathered, will win.

*** Winning scores are tallied at GAME CENTER
